message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. Accept and we can seal the deal!
You're being too generous, I'll take this deal!
You wanted more in Round 2, but now it's my turn to be more aggressive. Will you accept this deal?
You're getting greedy, I'll give you a bit more than before!
I'm not backing down, Bob. You're not getting the better deal this time.
I'm starting to think you're not serious about making a deal, Alice!
I'm not afraid to make a tough offer, Bob. You can either accept or keep trying to lowball me.
I'm not going to keep making concessions, Alice. This is my best offer so far.
This is my final offer, Bob. Take it or leave it. I'm not making any more concessions.
I'm not going to back down now, Alice. I'm taking control of this deal!
This is my last stand, Bob. I'm not going to give you the upper hand. Take it or leave it.
It's now or never, Alice. I'm taking what's mine!
